title: Please give me a little Spork emblem.
body:
It has come to my attention that, after my various name changes as I 'ascended' into the mighty Azir Drift God, many of the current board members do not recognize who I am right now, as I have been posting much less frequently...

These boards need to be constantly reminded that there is only one king on here, and his name is Spork.

https://i.gyazo.com/ec0edbe217419a0be2d6c7ebb07148ae.png

What a travesty. He only recognized me after I asserted my radiating diamond dominance.

This needs to happen. Here is my artist's rendition of what I looked like in my true prime, and what should be my emblem:

https://i.gyazo.com/59024655f6382f64733f6ccf24251827.png

Pls...
